mapper.insert: insert into statistics (total, varietyname_ct, provincename_ct, areacode_ct) values (#{total,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{varietynameCt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{provincenameCt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{areacodeCt,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.select: select total, varietyname_ct, provincename_ct, areacode_ct from statistics
